about_the_game:
oval Racer Series - Sandbox

This game, available on Steam Early Access, is not yet complete and may undergo significant changes during its development. To learn more about Steam Early Access, please visit

HOME OF THE OVAL RACER: The First-Ever Dedicated PC Game for UK Oval Racing

The game will simulate oval circuit racing in the UK, focusing on stock cars, bangers, and hot rods. It will blend realism and fun with accessible gameplay, dynamic crashes, and an engaging progression system. Players will race across iconic UK tracks, upgrade their cars, and compete in various racing disciplines.

The entire game has undergone a massive transformation. We now use Unreal Engine 5 and R-tune Player Physics and Fgear AI Physics, providing the best possible experience for an up-to-date racing/sandbox game.

Please note, that this is a sandbox racing game where you select your car from the menu, and it spawns next to you in the pits. You can jump in and out of your car and mess around on the track. Soon, you will be able to enjoy the game with friends, as multiplayer functionality is the next major update.

I will update this store page as I make progress on the game.
